...The most important warning is this: if you have severe symptoms and they don't go away...
...the motoring organizations have issued a warning to drivers following the recent falls of snow in many parts of the country...

trans.tranOther: something, especially a statement, that tells you that something bad, dangerous, or annoying might happen so that you can be ready or avoid it
